text:
Vertical Sysadmin | REMOTE | Part-time OK

Sales Agent - 30% commission

Seeking commission-only sales agent to sell DevOps training and software. Currently focused on GitLab. Past clients include Samsung, LinkedIn, VISA, Chevron, Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, Los Alamos National Laboratory, etc. Rave reviews! 17K for one week of on-site training for up to 12 students. 30% commission. Email me to apply. Hiring fast. www.verticalsysadmin.com
